meanings.definition: A type of Italian cured meat, similar to prosciutto.
meanings.sent1: The capicollo added a savory flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of capicollo on my pizza.
meanings.sent3: The capicollo told a funny joke to the salami.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the aroma of capicollo.
meanings.sent5: The capicollo glistened in the sunlight, tempting everyone with its deliciousness.

meanings.definition: To slice or serve capicollo as a cold cut.
meanings.sent1: I will capicollo the meat for the party platter.
meanings.sent2: She capicolloed the deli meat with precision.
meanings.sent3: The chef capicolloed the ham with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: His knife skills were so sharp, he capicolloed effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The guests watched in awe as he capicolloed the meat into thin slices.
